question: <image 1> Which of the following is the most likely independent variable in the study described in the newspaper clipping?
options: ['Perception of authority', 'Conformity', 'Perception of behavior', 'Response to authority', 'Age']
description:
The image is a newspaper clipping from July 21, 2018, under the section labeled "Psychology." The clipping is an advertisement for research participants wanted for a psychological study. The text reads:

"RESEARCH PARTICIPANTS WANTED: College students needed for a psychological study on authority and behavior. Participants must be available for five 30-minute sessions during the fall semester. Note: this research involves some use of confederates), and your responses to different kinds of authority will be assessed. Participants can leave at any time without penalty, and all IRB procedures will be followed. For further information & applications come to room 248, Jordan Hall."

The study focuses on examining participants' responses to different kinds of authority.
